description:
Over the course of nearly a year, we migrated Pinterest's primary
systems from Python2 to Python3. A large, tightly coupled codebase with
over 2 million lines of code, the Pinterest codebase contained nearly
every edge case that might exist in a Py2 to Py3 migration.

We'll cover our approach, gotchas, and tools, and the incredible impact
our migration has made on infra spend and code quality.
title: Migrating Pinterest from Python2 to Python3
